events.message: I received my order two days ago but the item was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The system has categorised this issue under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
The case was assigned to a customer support agent specializing in refunds for further handling.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear the product did not meet your expectations. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been opened or used so we can proceed with the refund?
My order number is 123456789. The item has not been used but I opened the package to check the product.
Thank you for the information. We can issue a full refund once the item is returned to our facility. I will email you the return label shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions regarding the return and refund.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The amount should be back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if you have any further questions or need assistance.
Since your refund has been confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your refund experience to help us improve our services.
